introduceText.english: //n//nMinzu University of China ( Minzu University of China ) is located in the Beijing university buildings of Haidian District, Nanlin National Library, north depends on Zhongguancun science and Technology Park, campus environment, elegant, simple and beautiful, humanities atmosphere, with distinctive ethnic characteristics.Minzu University of China is the predecessor of the 1941 to September Chinese Communist Party was founded in Yanan nationalities institute. In 1951June, the Central Institute of nationalities was formally established in Beijing, Ulav was appointed as the first dean. 1993November, changed its name to Minzu University of China. The current Secretary of school Party committee professor E Yitai, President of Professor chen.Party and national all previous leading collective has always been concerned about and pay attention to the construction and development of Minzu University of China. Its beginning to 1966, Mao Zedong, Liu Shaoji, Zhou Enlai, Zhu De and other party and state leaders has14 time delegate of school teachers and students. After the reform and opening up, Deng Xiaoping3meeting with representatives of teachers and students. In 1993 the school changed its name to Minzu University of China, President Jiang Zemin Comrade wrote for the school of new school. In 2001June, the school 50anniversary occasion, Premier Zhu Rongji comrade to inspect, and on behalf of the central government put forward " the Minzu University of China built the world's top-ranking university for Nationalities " struggling target. The same year, Hu Jintao, Li Lanqing and other national leaders to personally approved the State Ethnic Affairs Commission, Ministry of education, the State Planning Commission, Ministry of Finance four ministries jointly reported" good about doing further Minzu University of China.". In 2002June, the State Ethnic Affairs Commission, Ministry of education, Beijing Municipal People's government signed the" agreement" on the focus of Minzu University of China. In the height of Party and country takes seriously below, the school was approved in 1978 for the national key university,1999,2004has entered the" project 211" and"985 Project" key national construction university ranks.The school has 23 colleges and schools, covering 10disciplines including55undergraduate majors,5 First-Level Discipline doctorate authorization spot,39two level of discipline doctorate authorization and 132authorized a master's degree,8 professional master degree authorization, national key disciplines,3provincial-level key disciplines13,2National Liberal Arts Talent Training and scientific research base,1Ministry of education key Institute of Humanities and social science,3 National"985 Project" of philosophy social science innovation base.School at the beginning of, a number of scholars such as Pan Guangdan, celebrities, Wu Wenzao, Fei Xiaotong, Weng Dujian, Wu Zelin, Feng, Yang Chengzhi, Lin Yaohua, Fu Lehuan image, in Daoquan, smell, Equine Studies, and Wang Zhonghan wait for school to teach, to become the school teaching scientific research and discipline construction an important founder. The total number of existing school staff1730 people, including 1052 full-time teachers, full-time teachers the professor,587 associate professors,55.8% of the total number of full-time teachers. They are wearing Qingsha, Wang Yao, Geng Shimin, Zhang Mou Gongjin, Zhongjian, Hu Zhenhua, Sejun Ichi, Liu Bingjiang, Ma Yue, Li Kui Zheng, Yang Shengmin," if Binghao, gold, Xue Dayuan and other famous experts and scholars, and continuous emergence of many young rookie, has gradually become the academic leaders. In addition, the school also perennial employed more than 60foreign experts to teach. The school currently has academic degrees committee of the State Council Academic Evaluation Group, National Philosophy Social Science Planning Leading Group National Local Records subject review group, the leading group, Ministry of education, central Xinjiang coordination group, the Shanghai Cooperation Organization China education advisory bodies, the State Council Development Research Center of the state academic planning and review body of 18 members, two appointed2 academicians,1" scholar of the Yangtse River, new century millions of Talents Project" national person9 people, the national teacher2 people, Beijing City Department of education teaching master10 people," the new century excellent talent support program" for30 people, country civilian appoint outstanding contribution expert10 people, academic leaders, academic leader96 people, enjoy special government allowances of the State Council113 people. The school with 27 countries and regions in the81 University and scientific research institutions to establish cooperation relations, every year a batch in related fields has an important influence on the well-known scholars visiting the school to give lectures, AC.Schools for the 31provinces, autonomous regions and Hong Kong and Macao regions admissions, the existing full-time students and 15822 people, including 11247 undergraduates, master and doctoral students, more than 4000 people, the national minority preparatory course students 481 people; undergraduate (including preppy ) from 55 minority students to maintain in 60% above. The school is" Chinese government scholarship students receive" school, from 25 countries and374 international students study at school. Since its establishment, the school for the state transport more than 10ethnic graduates. There are well-known experts and scholars nearly 1000, minority provincial leaders nearly 100, departmental-level cadres nearly a thousand million, leading cadres at county level, they are in different positions as national unity and development have made outstanding contributions. Minzu University of China has become the training of ethnic minority talents and national unity example cradle.The school now covers an area of 378000 square meters, the other the planning of new campus covers an area of 810000square meters. Campus construction area of 583000square meters, teaching administration building more than 20square meters, the total assets of 1590000000 yuan. Have all kinds of books and electronic books of more than 300 books, ethnology, language and literature of Chinese minority nationalities literature reserves in the forefront of domestic colleges and universities. The University Press is a national teaching materials and publishing base," Journal of Minzu University of China" and" Research on education for ethnic minorities" is facing domestic and international distribution of national core journals. National Museum houses more than 3 pieces of precious cultural relics, has become the students' patriotism education and teaching practice base.At present, the school staff and students is a scientific outlook on development as a guide, in accordance with the national economic and social development strategy and the national unity and development needs, closely around improve the quality of personnel training and scientific research innovation ability two big themes, features hing school, the quality of legislation to implement talent strong school school and three grand strategy, not to move or retreat to take quality first, the main content, the sustainable development road of the school, towards the completion of distinctive characteristics, the international famous high level research university of world top-ranking nation goal.

chinese.intro: //n//n简介： //n 中央民族大学的前身是建立在1956the中央民族大学外语教学外语学院。 1984September开始招收英语专业的学生。在1986February，外语系的建立，在1987started招收英语专业，在招聘俄语专业学生1989started。开始在俄罗斯1992for专业。 2002December外国语学院的成立。 2004started以招收英语，日语和韩语undergraduates.Address（翻译）

chinese.name: 18号教学楼-音乐学院-20号教学楼
图书馆
chinese.intro: //n//n简介： //n 中央民族大学图书馆位于校园西南角，环境幽雅安静，总面积24500O ，有14个典藏与借阅合一的阅览室、2100个阅览座位、16个学者研究室（厢）及15个自习室（厅），图书自动化管理系统、网络系统、门禁系统、自动消防报警系统、电视监控系统、中央空调及恒温恒湿系统等各种现代化设施齐备。 1999年8月至今，全国民族高校图书馆工作委员会秘书处设在本馆，现任馆长李德龙教授任该图工委副主任兼秘书长。
